channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Investigators to wrap up public hearings into fatal midair crash between Army chopper and airplane
item.description: The National Transportation Safety Board will wrap up its public testimony about the fatal midair crash between an Army helicopter and a commercial jet.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump administration from ending protections for 60,000 from Central America and Nepal
Teacher charged in fatal stabbing of couple on a hike with their kids is ordered held without bond
